name: Lost Soul (Geek_Joystick)
description:
Lost Soul is a game where you, Simon, search for a way to the other side.

For that you must travel through 5 puzlly levels (or is it 6?), where you will have to rely on your audition to find your way through them. Find coins, solve puzzles, and get to the end of my challenge.

This game was made entirely by Geek_Joystick for the No Video Jam 2020.
Big thanks to them for that really interesting challenge :D.
